spirit:hwParameter.spirit:prompt: No. of multi-frames in ILA sequence:
No. of control bits per sample (CS):
Total no. of bits per sample (N'):
No. of samples per converter per frame cycle (S):
No. of control words per frame clock period per link (CF):

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script: Validate('Maximum size of a multi-frame is 1024 octets. Please change the value of F and/or K to reduce number of octets in a multi-frame.', Less(Mul('F', 'K'), '1025'));\ Validate('Minimum size of a multi-frame is 17 octets. Please change the value of F and/or K to increase number of octets in a multi-frame.', Gt(Mul('F', 'K'), '16'));\

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:description: CoreJESD204BTX is the transmitter interface of the JEDEC JESD204B standard. This specification describes a high speed serial interface for data converters
